1852) (= S. inarcualis GUENÉE 1854) – Pyralidae : Omiodes indicata (FABRICIUS 1775).

D i s t r i b u t i o n: Réunion , Mauritius .

Endemic to the Mascarenes. The synonymy of
Echthromorpha macula BRULLÉ
is based on the sculpturation of the thorax and abdomen. Concerning colouration specimens from Réunion have more black markings than the Mauritian ones.
